Daniel McOrmond

After last year’s Dakar Rally was cancelled, it was exciting to see the race return this year with a new location: South America. Jalopnik recently published a gallery of race photos here. I’ve got a lot of respect for the drivers and teams that compete in this race. Maybe I’m in the wrong industry, because I would love to participate in this event at some level.
